templates.name: Welcome - New Connection
templates.content:

Thanks for connecting! I noticed you're interested in {{industry}}.

What's keeping you busy these days?

Best,
{{your_name}}

templates.name: Follow-up - After Meeting
templates.content:
Hi {{name}},

Great connecting with you yesterday about {{topic}}.

Here's that [resource] I mentioned.

Let me know if you have any questions!

Best,
{{your_name}}

templates.content:

templates.name: Meeting Cancellation
templates.content:
